verbs.description: North Korea [V: has] praised the outcome of Tuesday 's summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un , with state media declaring the meeting an " epoch - making " event of " great significance .

[ARG0: North Korea] has [V: praised] [ARG1: the outcome of Tuesday 's summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] , [ARGM-ADV: with state media declaring the meeting an " epoch - making " event of " great significance] .

North Korea has praised the outcome of Tuesday 's summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un , with [ARG0: state media] [V: declaring] [ARG1: the meeting an " epoch - making " event of " great significance] .
